work.desc: My Media Creative is a creative agency for social change. Our work in marketing, branding, and content creation is tied together by passion and care for social and environmentally focused organizations.

services.title: Services
services.desc: My Media Creative is a social change creative agency. We do marketing, branding, video, design, websites, social media, and other creative things for nonprofits, social enterprises, foundations, governments, and charities.

contact.title: Contact
contact.desc: My Media Creative is a creative agency for social change. Are you a nonprofit, foundation, social enterprise, government, or charity? We'd love to work with you. Reach out.
